data.text: RT @AAI_Official: #AAI has achieved a major milestone in Indian #CivilAviation. AAI has successfully applied the latest technology in Air N…

For the first time in the history of the Indian aviation industry, IndiGo has successfully completed an LPV (Localizer Performance with Vertical Guidance)  approach on its ATR aircraft using the indigenous Gagan Satellite to land at @aaiksgairport , Rajasthan.
